## FadingFeatureMixin.addFadingProperties() method

The mixin classes should call this method to register the properties \[\[fadeNear\]\] and \[\[fadeFar\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected addFadingProperties(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void
